aboutMeSection.title: ABOUT ME
aboutMeSection.subtitle: Software Developer
aboutMeSection.description: I am a proactive software developer with strong experience building scalable applications using AWS services such as Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, Cognito, and SQS. I also specialize in modern frontend and mobile development using React, React Native, and Angular. I am passionate about creating efficient, intuitive solutions and constantly seek new challenges to grow both professionally and personally.
